CIPHER.245.cipherString: If a composer could say what he had to say in words he would not bother trying to say it in music.
CIPHER.245.question: A quote by Gustav Mahler has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.245.author: Gustav Mahler

CIPHER.225.cipherString: Dream big and aim higher, give the universe permission to show you what's possible if you don't limit yourself!
CIPHER.225.question: Decode this quote by Felecia Etienne which has been encoded using the Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.225.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.243.cipherString: Make time to reflect on the impact that your habits have on yourself and others then adjust accordingly when needed!
CIPHER.243.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the K2 Patristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told that RHPG maps to DOTH.
CIPHER.243.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.235.cipherString: In a very real sense we have two minds, one that thinks and one that feels
CIPHER.235.question: The following quote by Daniel Goleman needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of MOVIE and polybius key of OBSERVING.
CIPHER.235.author: Daniel Goleman

CIPHER.238.cipherString: Only those who look with the eyes of children can lose themselves in the object of their wonder.
CIPHER.238.question: A quote by Eberhard Arnold has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it starts with the word ONLY.
CIPHER.238.author: Eberhard Arnold

CIPHER.224.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 1895 1027 3046 298167.. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.230.cipherString: You take people, you put them on a journey, you give them peril, you find out who they really are.
CIPHER.230.question: A quote by Joss Whedon has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it ends with the word ARE.
CIPHER.230.author: Joss Whedon

CIPHER.236.cipherString: You have to dream dreams to live dreams.
CIPHER.236.question: The following strange phrases encode a quote by Eric Lindros using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the cipher text UP FOR ROMAN CARGO ABOVE ABYSS decodes to be LIVED
CIPHER.236.author: Eric Lindros

CIPHER.228.cipherString: Music has always been my protection against the world, from a very young age. I feel safe inside of a jam.
CIPHER.228.question: A quote by Trey Anastasio has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the words OF and MY.
CIPHER.228.author: Trey Anastasio

CIPHER.229.cipherString: Learning passes for wisdom among them who want both.
CIPHER.229.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Sir W. Temple using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.229.author: Sir W. Temple

CIPHER.226.cipherString: I'm not scared of anything in particular, but I am motivated by a fear of failure as opposed to a need to succeed.
CIPHER.226.question: A quote by Heston Blumenthal has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.226.author: Heston Blumenthal

CIPHER.227.cipherString: Wisdom oft times consists of knowing what to do next.
CIPHER.227.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Herbert Hoover using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.227.author: Herbert Hoover

CIPHER.242.cipherString: I prefer to think of myself as a musician who is still learning and trying to do something every time out.
CIPHER.242.question: A quote by Geddy Lee has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word EVERY.
CIPHER.242.author: Geddy Lee

CIPHER.237.cipherString: Music is love in search of a word.
CIPHER.237.question: The following quote by Sidney Lanier needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=5 and b=3.
CIPHER.237.author: Sidney Lanier

CIPHER.240.cipherString: Men ilve best upon a little: nature hsa ordained awl too eb hapy, if they would but learn how two ewes her gifts.
CIPHER.240.question: Decode a quote by Claudius that has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher.  Unfortunately the message was received over a bad connection, so there are some errors in it.
CIPHER.240.author: Claudius

CIPHER.241.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 9103756 45108 0842769. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.244.cipherString: Los retos son lo que hacen la vida interesante, y superarlos es lo que hace que la vida tenga un significado.
CIPHER.244.question: A quote by an unknown person in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.244.author: unknown
CIPHER.244.translation: Challenges are what make life interesting, and overcoming them is what give life a purpose.

CIPHER.233.cipherString: Life is a canvas. Paint it with colors that bring you joy.
CIPHER.233.question: A quote by Pep Talk Radio has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has HATBRINGY in it corresponding to the encoded text K H P W U S T N U V B D L, meaning B = ‚óè√ó√ó; D = ‚Äì‚óè‚Äì; H = ‚óè‚óè‚óè; K = ‚Äì√ó‚óè; L = ‚Äì√ó‚Äì; N = √ó‚óè‚óè; P = √ó‚óè‚Äì; S = ‚óè‚óè√ó; T = ‚óè‚Äì‚óè; U = √ó‚Äì‚óè; V = √ó‚Äì‚Äì; W = √ó‚Äì√ó.
CIPHER.233.author: Pep Talk Radio

CIPHER.232.cipherString: It never seems to occur to some people, that, like beauty, a sense of humor may sometimes be fatal.
CIPHER.232.question: A quote by Edgar Rice Burroghs has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.232.author: Edgar Rice Burroghs

CIPHER.222.cipherString: It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly.
CIPHER.222.question: A quote by Isaac Asimov has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has IFETHAT somewhere in it.
CIPHER.222.author: Isaac Asimov

CIPHER.234.cipherString: An expert is an ordinary person who consistently sought knowledge in a specific field and applied it.
CIPHER.234.question: A quote by Gift Gugu Mona has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.234.author: Gift Gugu Mona

CIPHER.223.cipherString: Success will be within your reach only when you start reaching out for it.
CIPHER.223.question: The following quote by Stephen Richards needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of TUBES
CIPHER.223.author: Stephen Richards

CIPHER.239.cipherString: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
CIPHER.239.question: The following quote by Hippocrates needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of MAINE and polybius key of MAGNITUDE.
CIPHER.239.author: Hippocrates

CIPHER.231.cipherString: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
CIPHER.231.question: Decode this quote by David Hume which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.231.author: David Hume
